ai-patthana19.6:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.6:1.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected arises with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness due to the reason.
ai-patthana19.6:1.1_1: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness arises dependent on the mind and keeping it connected. Consequently, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-patthana19.6:1.1_2: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. ... Mindfulness arises dependent on the seventh cause.
ai-patthana19.6:2.1_0: Without placing the mind and keeping it connected, without placing the mind, keeping it connected arises. ...
ai-patthana19.6:3.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
ai-patthana19.6:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana19.6:4.1_0: less than thirty objects forty-two objects. ...
ai-patthana19.6:4.1_1: thirty-two parts in the forest grove ...
ai-patthana19.6:4.1_2: Will not be under the one wise wisdom,
